mutants.code:
def convert_number_to_string(number):
    if not 1000 < number <= 9999:
        return 'Error: Number is not within the range 1000 to 9999.'
    number_str = str(number).replace('.', '')
    reversed_str = number_str[::-1]
    final_str = '-'.join(reversed_str)
    return final_str
